title: Paper Doll, "Paper Doll in Petticoats", 1840–60
medium: Etching with graphite, brush and gouache and watercolor, pen and black ink on off-white wove paper.
description: Black haired paper doll in white petticoats and camisole (corset?) with arms folded in front of her.

tombstone.epitaph:
Paper Doll, "Paper Doll in Petticoats", 1840–60.
1840–60. Etching with graphite, brush and gouache and watercolor, pen and black ink on off-white wove paper.. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-23.
